result.arabic_text: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
result.translation: They were guided to the best of words[13] and they were guided to the praiseworthy path[14].
result.footnotes:
[13] i.e., the testimony of faith, extolling and praising Allah.
 [14] i.e., Islam.
